name: Aqua buttons
description:
*** This style should work with any theme. ***

This style changes the buttons to closely mimic the look of the Mac OS X Aqua buttons.

*** UPDATES ***

03-05-10: Fixed a few bugs, and updated appearance
03-03-10:
- Updated 'accept' button appearance
- Fixed bug where Stylish manager tag headers would be treated as buttons.
- Reverted to previous version to improve compatibility, and updated button appearance.
03-02-10: Fixed a few bugs by specifying the button as a "dialog button", and no other kind.
